import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './Admin.css' import { Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; export default function Admin({ candidate1, candidate2, setResultStat, resultStat }) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const handleDeclareResults = () => { setResultStat(true); } useEffect(() => { return () => { <>

Results are Declared

{candidate1.votecount > candidate2.votecount ? candidate1.name : candidate2.name} won the Election

} }, [resultStat]) return (

Admin Panel

Vote Count

# Name Votes
1 {candidate1.name} {candidate1.votecount}
2 {candidate2.name} {candidate2.votecount}
{resultStat ? <>

Results are Declared

{candidate1.votecount > candidate2.votecount ? candidate1.name : candidate2.name} won the Election

:
Declare the Results
}
) }
